<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Contacts](/Feats.aspx?ID=2144) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 208 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14); [Connections](/Feats.aspx?ID=770) or [Criminal Connections](/Feats.aspx?ID=2119)

</column>

---

You know where to go, who to talk to, and how to make new connections, fast. Upon entering a new settlement, spending 1 day of downtime allows you to build enough connections to make use of the Connections or Underworld Connections feats. If you're legendary in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14), you can form the required connections within 1 hour of entering a new settlement.
name: Quick Contacts
prerequisite: Expert in Society; Connections or Criminal Connections
